title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
EB: Expect: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. Expected: A popup menu appears to add breakpoints/marks, etc. Actual: No menu is displayed.
